page.title: 17Amenities
page.content: Amenities for tourists and local people include:- 4 churches,3 restaurants,1 post office, 11 food shops,3 gift shops,1 newsagent,1 chemist,14 other shops,4 litter bins,22 seats,5 post boxes,6 public houses and 1 set of toilets. It's a tourist's area but we don't think there are enough amenities for tourists at such times as Wakes week. When there are 3000 or more people and only 1 set of toilets! There are also a number of societies: Brownie,Cub and Guide packs,a youth club,2 dancing classes, a primary school,3 recreation grounds,2 junior football clubs,a junior band,2 piano tutors, a Womens Institute,a band,a Male voice choir,a Keepfit class, church choirs, Parents committee for school,Ex-servicemen's club,Community Players,a Football club and 3 halls.
